thread.title: Two killed as training aircraft crashes in Faisalabad
thread.title_full: Two killed as training aircraft crashes in Faisalabad

author: News Desk
title: Two killed as training aircraft crashes in Faisalabad
text:
The aircra­ft was comple­tely destro­yed as a result of the crash Published: February 24, 2017 Share Tweet Email The aircraft was completely destroyed as a result of the crash. 
A Shaheen Flying Club training plane on Friday crashed on Faisalabad, killing the training instructor and the trainee pilot, Express News reported. 
The aircraft was compeletly destroyed as a result of the crash. 
This is a developing story and will be updated accordingly.
